alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hancock and south central Pearl River Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 245 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Picayune, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Picayune. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
